SQL.statement: CREATE BUFFERPOOL NOTDEFBP01 PAGESIZE 8 K
CREATE BUFFERPOOL NOTDEFBP02 PAGESIZE 16 K
CREATE BUFFERPOOL NOTDEFBP03 PAGESIZE 32 K

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE GENERAL PAGESIZE 32 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\GTS1' 5120, FILE 'DB2\GTS2' 5120, FILE 'DB2\GTS3' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "NOTDEFBP03" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
COMMENT ON TABLESPACE GENERAL IS 'Tablespace for general use.'

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE FIRST PAGESIZE 16 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\FTS1' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "NOTDEFBP02" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
COMMENT ON TABLESPACE FIRST IS 'Tablespace for first use.'

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE SECOND PAGESIZE 16 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\STS1' 5120, FILE 'DB2\STS2' 5120, FILE 'DB2\STS3' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "NOTDEFBP02" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
COMMENT ON TABLESPACE SECOND IS 'Tablespace for second use.'

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE THIRD PAGESIZE 16 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\TTS1' 5120, FILE 'DB2\TTS2' 5120, FILE 'DB2\TTS3' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "NOTDEFBP02" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
COMMENT ON TABLESPACE THIRD IS 'Tablespace for third use.'

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE USERSPACE2 PAGESIZE 8 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\U2TS1' 5120, FILE 'DB2\U2TS2' 5120, FILE 'DB2\U2TS3' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "NOTDEFBP01" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE USERSPACE3 PAGESIZE 8 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\U3TS1' 5120, FILE 'DB2\U3TS2' 5120, FILE 'DB2\U3TS3' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "NOTDEFBP01" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON

NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ENTRA_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TOT_BAL_TX_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TOT_PD_TX_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ORD_GRP_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT , "ORIGIN" CHAR(4) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "WOD_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BPI_REV_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "QTY_DSCNT_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "INVC_TXT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PRSNT_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "OLD_PRSNT_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_FST_CYC" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_LVL" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PDUN_MAX_DUE_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TM_ID" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BON_CHQ_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "OLD_PD_ART_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "OLD_MGM_GFT_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BON_OLD_SHP_UN_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "SHP_UN_CHG_QTY" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PRD_USED_PNTS_QTY" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "TOT_USED_PNTS_QTY" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_DEL_GRP_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_DEL_SEQ_NO" INTEGER NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "ORIGIN_ORD_SFX" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "YOUR_REF_ID" CHAR(20) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "CONTRA_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'N' , "CHILD_SEQ" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "REFERR_ORD_DUN_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "RSPND_CAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'R' , "WO_BAL_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'N' , "NO_SHP_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LST_LC_STAT_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "LS_LC_STAT_CSE_CDE" CHAR(2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "PPO_CDE" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BAD_CHQ_FE_AMT" DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "BAD_CHQ_DUN_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'Y' , "BAD_CHQ_COLL_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'Y' , "SUBSCR_RENEW_DTE" DATE NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT '0001-01-01' , "SUBSCR_RENEW_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "NEWS_LTR_FLG" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'Y' , "MAX_CONSG_SPLIT_NO" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "UNAPPL_ART_RET_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "UNAPPL_BAL_LTR_FLG" CHAR(1) WITH DEFAULT ' ' , "SHP_UNAPPL_FLG" CHAR(1) WITH DEFAULT ' ' , "ART_DSCNT_CNT" SMALLINT NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT ) CCSID UNICODE DATA CAPTURE CHANGES PARTITION BY RANGE("PRTN_NO") (PART "PART0" STARTING(1) IN FOURTH, PART "PART1" STARTING(2) IN FIFTH, PART "PART2" STARTING(3) IN SIXTH, PART "PART3" STARTING(4) IN SEVENTH, PART "PART4" STARTING(5) IN EIGTH, PART "PART5" STARTING(6) IN NINTH, PART "PART6" STARTING(7) IN TENTH, PART "PART7" STARTING(8) IN ELEVENTH, PART "PART8" STARTING(9) IN TWELVE, PART "PART9" STARTING(10) IN thirteenth, PART "PART10" STARTING(11) IN fourteenth, PART "PART11" STARTING(12) IN fifteenth, PART "PART12" STARTING(13) IN sixteenth, PART "PART13" STARTING(14) IN seventeenth, PART "PART14" STARTING(15) IN eighteenth, PART "PART15" STARTING(16) ENDING(16) IN nineteenth) distribute by hash ("PRTN_NO", "DIV_ID", "PROD_SFX", "CUST_NO", "ORD_SFX")
ALTER TABLE "ARYMP01"."Hamster" ADD unique ("PRTN_NO", "DIV_ID", "PROD_SFX", "CUST_NO", "ORD_SFX")
